query.name: Top MITRE attack tactics
query.query:
aggregate: count
namespace: ossec-tarsyer:ossec
application: ossec
group_by:
  - agent.name
  - rule.mitre.tactic
duration:
  relative: 86400
expression_internal:
  '1':
    '1':
      currentField: agent.name
      searchValue: Logiq
      operator: '=~'
expression: '{([agent.name] =~ ''Logiq'')}'

query.name: Alerts (6h)
query.query:
aggregate: count
namespace: ossec-tarsyer:ossec
application: ossec
group_by:
  - agent.name
duration:
  relative: 21600
allowEmpty: true
step: 10m

query.description: reporting query generated on Mon, 07 Feb 2022 11:01:05 GMT
query.name: PCI DSS checks
query.query:
namespace: ossec-tarsyer:ossec
application: ossec
aggregate: count
group_by:
  - rule.pci_dss
  - agent.name
  - rule.description
duration:
  relative: 86400
allowEmpty: false
expression_internal:
  '1':
    '1':
      currentField: agent.name
      searchValue: hauler
      operator: '=~'
    '2':
      currentField: agent.name
      searchValue: Logiq
      operator: '=~'
expression: '{([agent.name] =~ ''hauler'' || [agent.name] =~ ''Logiq'')}'

query.name: Managers
query.query:
aggregate: count
namespace: ossec-tarsyer:ossec
application: ossec
group_by:
  - manager.name
duration:
  relative: 86400

query.name: MITRE alerts
query.query:
aggregate: count
namespace: ossec-tarsyer:ossec
application: ossec
group_by:
  - agent.name
  - rule.mitre.id
  - rule.mitre.tactic
  - rule.description
  - rule.level
  - rule.id
duration:
  relative: 86400

query.name: HIPAA Alerts
query.query:
aggregate: count
namespace: ossec-tarsyer:ossec
application: ossec
group_by:
  - agent.name
  - rule.description
  - rule.level
  - rule.id
  - rule.hipaa
duration:
  relative: 86400

group_by:
  - agent.name

  - rule.hipaa
duration:
  relative: 86400

query.name: Agents
query.query:
aggregate: count
namespace: ossec-tarsyer:ossec
application: ossec
duration:
  relative: 86400
allowEmpty: true
match: false
group_by:
  - agent.name
step: ''

query.description: reporting query generated on Mon, 07 Feb 2022 11:01:05 GMT
query.name: PCI DSS checks
query.query:
namespace: ossec-tarsyer:ossec
application: ossec
aggregate: count
group_by:
  - rule.pci_dss
  - agent.name
  - rule.description
duration:
  relative: 86400
allowEmpty: false
expression_internal:
  '1':
    '1':
      currentField: agent.name
      searchValue: hauler
      operator: '=~'
    '2':
      currentField: agent.name
      searchValue: Logiq
      operator: '=~'
expression: '{([agent.name] =~ ''hauler'' || [agent.name] =~ ''Logiq'')}'

query.name: MITRE alerts
